message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but $80 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping to get. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $120 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
